website_summaries.verdict: An unbeatable deal: four telescopic back scratchers, user-friendly design, reasonable reach, low price.
pros: Rubber-coated telescopic hands with good reach
Metal bear claw fingers feel good
cons: A few rare reports of handles bending or breaking

customer_reviews.title: Compare to original Bear Claw
customer_reviews.text: I have the original Bear Claw purchased over 17 years ago for $6 if I remember correctly. So after weeks of being unable to find my Bear Claw I ordered this 4 pack. Then 3 days later found the original. Higher grade quality metal with the Bear Claw. But I'm very pleased with LEMENG less quality to make it possible to receive 4 scratchers. So that's why I gave you 5 Stars...PRICE.. Now, I have a back-scratcher in every room. Can't tell any difference in the effectiveness of getting a great back scratch. Great Value
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Scratch Away — You’ll Love It!
customer_reviews.text: After carefully guarding my own bamboo backscratcher for nearly ten years, I got the brilliant idea to supply my family with their very own scratching implements. They made great Easter basket gifts and after a few faux light saber fights, they were being used for their intended purpose, relieving itches in those places for which you don’t want to spend too long wondering about the origin of said itch. The dog may or may have have benefited from a tummy rub (er...scratch) or two that did not require bending down.
customer_reviews.author: E. Pruetz

customer_reviews.title: I honestly can't believe so many people have given them good reviews! The rubber piece on the end popped ...
customer_reviews.text: These stink! I honestly can't believe so many people have given them good reviews! The rubber piece on the end popped off the first time I used it and I had to keep putting it back on. Then the dang thing didn't stay extended to actually reach you back. You pull it out and as soon as there is even a little late against it (which happens when scratching your back) it pushes back in. So annoying and not even worth the hassle of retuning. Save your money people, keep looking!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Benson

customer_reviews.title: Effectively scratches
customer_reviews.text: These are worth the price and do their job. However, one broke easily when extended, not a huge deal as I still have 3 more. My gripe is the way they smell, not that it's incredibly noticeable, just that i can sometimes smell the metal after using it and am very sensitive to smells. It's a lot like the smell of pennies. I'd still buy again though.
customer_reviews.author: Tre

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe!!
customer_reviews.text: My son stole one! Called it the "backscratcher 4000"! This really is the most superior backscratcher I have ever used! Handy for forcing my dog out from under the bed too!!
customer_reviews.author: E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I’m the person that probably would leave open scratch marks on their back from how hard I like my back scratched. My husband barely wants his back touched when he needs to scratch. These work awesome for both of us. The length of the extension is a few feet long (3 ft, maybe). I only extend it about a foot to use, and it stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great scratchers
customer_reviews.text: SO great! No pressure at all to get a really nice scratch. The telescoping arm stays put and it is not too short. In fact, I don't even need to extend them all the way to reach over my shoulder. Nice cushioned, colored handles too.
customer_reviews.author: Varley M.

customer_reviews.title: Every night at 9pm...
customer_reviews.text: Every night, at around 9 pm, I get an itch. Right there in the middle of my back where I cannot reach. Door jams just don't scratch the itch like a good back scratcher can! And this set is perfect for the job! No sharp edges, yet somehow sharp enough to offer a satisfying scratch for your itch. Telescopic design allows you to adjust the length and reach all the unreachable spots. Plus, with several scratchers in the pack, you can have one handy in every room and your car!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: not recommended for eating soup
customer_reviews.text: This metal bear claw designed back-scratcher, when fully extended, measures 22 3/4" long. Gratifyingly, it's got more uses than just remedying that maddening hard-to-reach itch on your back. I've used it to snatch an object that had rolled deep under the bed. When roleplaying, it passes as a mighty trident for when I want to be Aquaman. On a hot summer day, when all I had were dirty dining utensils, I've used it to eat ice cream. I've tried to eat soup with it, but that just takes forever. The description blurb also boasts that it serves as a hand massager, but that seems silly. Comes four in a pack in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: H. Bala

customer_reviews.title: They are great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors and there are 4 of them so that's good. The telescopic arm is sturdy and stays where you put it. My one complaint about it and why I only did 3 stars is because the "claws" that scratch your back are even with the arm so in order for it to really work, you have to scratch at an angle. Had the claws been even 1/4" longer these would be perfect.. They look nice but not a very good design if that makes sense. They6 were as advertised and I received them quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie J. Dennison

customer_reviews.title: Of the 4 I purchased 2 have already broken due ...
customer_reviews.text: Of the 4 I purchased 2 have already broken due to what I can only assume is a manufacturing defect. As I extended it 2 little brass pieces felt out and the end fell to the floor leaving me with just a handle.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Finch

customer_reviews.title: The rubber handles are great to provide a non-slip grip
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a present and now he has a back scratcher for every room in the house! The rubber handles are great to provide a non-slip grip. The extendable arm glides in and out easily. The cute bear paw pattern for the ends are a cute touch. The claws themselves hit all the right spots.
customer_reviews.author: Real Housewife of Bel Air

customer_reviews.title: A god sent .....
customer_reviews.text: I got soo many mosquito bites on my back that itched so much this summer - even my whole family got tired of me asking them to itch my back. I found these on Amazon and ordered them immediately. Holy Cow - these were a godsend....they are telescoping so they stretch out and then retract and are compact. I have them hidden all over the place and they aren't scratchy or dull - they got the job done!!! You can't beat the price for such a fulfilling product. I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great back scratcher
customer_reviews.text: Convenient four pack - one for the car, one for the bedroom and one for the bathroom. Haven't decided about the 4th one yet. They collapse to a small size which is good for travel and storage in a drawer. Wonderful relief for my itchy back. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Therese Weber

customer_reviews.title: Really great to get those hard to reach itches
customer_reviews.text: I love these for my back, because most the time I can't reach where I'm itching. At first the handles are really tight and sturdy, but after more and more uses the handles will become a little loose and wobbly. I don't think there is a way to tighten them back to how they first were. It doesn't affect the use of the tool though. These work really nice, and I love how they come in a pack of 4. I keep one in every area of my house that I am in.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Jolley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the itchy back!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these during a particularly bad allergy outbreak. I was itching everywhere! There is always that one spot on your back you can't reach and it was driving me nuts! These scratchers are perfect. They are compact but telescope out to nice length. I even keep one in my travel supplies. You know, just in case!
customer_reviews.author: Island Kat

customer_reviews.title: OK, low price, works excellent and at the price, get the 4 pack.
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the single. I know now the 4 pack is the same as the single pack. And the single pack lasted until 3 days ago. what happened is the section next to the handle simply quit grasping the extensions. I was not able to solve it so bought the 4 pack. I am pleased with their back scratching ability. Nothing lasts forever so I still rate the product as excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: I can reach any spot on my back. The little "fingers" can be a little rough but they get the job done. So much better then trying to get my husband to scratch the right spot - "a little bit higher", "a little bit lower", "a little to the right" and meanwhile I am getting more and more frustrated. Now I get the right spot every time.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette N

customer_reviews.title: AVOID this!
customer_reviews.text: All of these fell apart in just a few days, now they are in the garbage, DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Minor adjusting needed but great after that.
customer_reviews.text: These back scratchers are of better quality than I thought they'd be. They are light, easy to extend and can easily reach all the spots that need reaching. They just need minor adjusting of the claws to get the correct angle needed for each person. The just need to be bent slightly. Once you do that, they are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: THE MCWHORTERS

customer_reviews.title: Good value, work great, very durable
customer_reviews.text: Great value! Scratches really well - not dull at all, but also not too sharp that it's uncomfortable. Durable - I've had these before, lasted several years, but somehow got "lost," so this was a replacement order. (Just don't leave them in the sun's heat too much - the rubber on the handle will break down a little.) ... Plus, I use the extender to reach the ceiling fan/light chains. LOL... hey, don't judge - it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Good value for the money. I've seen them in local department stores for 50-75% more.
customer_reviews.author: Novice gardener

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Handles came off all of these shortly after receiving making them almost impossible to use
customer_reviews.author: Sapphirre

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: At this price, I truthfully expected this pack of four back scratchers to be flimsy and cheaply made -- but imagine my surprise when neither was true!! Not only do these extend over twice their size, but the 'fingers' of the bear claw are curled just enough to help with scratching the back. I am beyond pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the length option. Have several bamboo scratchers but never can get where I want. My grandkids have enjoyed them also, both for them AND me. Wooho. Great product for price
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: You would have thought that I handed out gold in their stockings Everyone was thrilled with this product and starting scratching their back immediately Every body needs one of these. because you never know when you need to scratch your back and no one is around.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Owens

customer_reviews.title: All of these fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Every one of the back scratchers disassembled on me after a while. All broke at the same position in the telescoping handle near the head. Seemed like a good idea, but they were just not sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R Wymer

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: These were used as stocking stuffers so I didn't get one for myself but I can tell you that all my scratchers extended and collapsed as they were supposed to, the colors were even on the handles which were also sturdy and easy to grip. Everyone was excited over these.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Itches begone
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a back scratcher (or four of them)? They work. Itches scratched. My kids think they are pretty cool. They are pretty easily impressed though. Half the time they play with the box and not the stuff I order for them, so you might not want to judge it by them. If any adults comment on them I will be sure to check back in with an in depth update.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I grabbed these bad boys for the whole family . Great price. Not very sturdy though. But put it in the hands of a 9 month old theyight destroy anything. Colors were great to coordinate a family member there own favorite color. Does what it suppose to do .
customer_reviews.author: mercy gutz

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, awesome, awesome!! Best itch tool! So much BETTER than wood! I love that it telescopes out for use, and compacts back down for easy storing. I also use this to get items that are out of reach. I gave a few away, and they loved them too!
customer_reviews.author: BlondieGal

customer_reviews.title: All broke less than a week
customer_reviews.text: I think all these good reviews are either getting paid to say nice stuff or got them for free. They SUCK they are NOT sturdy they all broke in less than a week, 1 didn't even last 2 scratches n the pieces fell apart. Your best bet is to get the bamboo ones or use a fork 😂 at least its sturdy just don't reuse for food lol.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Great little scratcher!
customer_reviews.text: Good little scratchers! They are sort of hard to extend and retract. But they serve their purpose! I've even used to as a grabber to get a cord that fell behind a credenza!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Panteleeff

customer_reviews.title: Different use for me
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these, but I use them at the grocery store. I am short and the store rarely zones their product, so I just extend the handle and I can reach the top shelf to bring the product forward. I carry it in my purse. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie blue

customer_reviews.title: Buy them, your family will smile 😃
customer_reviews.text: Someone in your family will LOVE these. Very cute and work well. Didn't use the extender so I don't know how durable that is but didn't need to. Buy one for everyone and they will smile..adults too!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: People love them! They scratch almost a little *too* well ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the hit of my office. I had one for home, took one into work and gave 2 away to coworkers. People love them! They scratch almost a little *too* well on bare skin -- but they do work!
customer_reviews.author: Bellachancey

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart first use.
customer_reviews.text: My daughters used it once and metal plastic part went sliding out of plastic handle and onto the floor. Maybe mine was defective. Others I have given haven’t complained, but most people don’t when given as part of gift. 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Michael Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Keep one in every room of your house
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic buy. I keep one in my purse and by my bed. They go where I go lol. When I have dry itchy skin I usually bare down pretty hard and they're sturdy enough for me. I love them
customer_reviews.author: Mary Elizabeth Lindell

customer_reviews.title: Not really happy, I though it was sharper
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s good to use over clothes, but I was expecting something a little bit sharper... more like a real nail feeling... so I’m not really happy but it is good quality, great length and good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: AngelicaMoya

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t broken yet.
customer_reviews.text: I found them to be sturdy and they have not broken yet. 45 days daily use. I am careful and deliberate in extending them. Family Used three. Didn’t try 4th. All still fine, no issues after 45 days. Inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Redpawn3

customer_reviews.title: Good stocking stuffers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as stocking stuffers for my husband and 3 boys. Christmas Eve, #1 son opened his stocking early and hubby was jealous. Next morning, he had his very own. I don't use his at all. wink wink
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Cook

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I bought one for my Husband, my Co-Worker and Her Daughter! We each got the color that we liked the most! The "claws" are a little pointed, so not mush pressure is needed at all! It really gets the job done! And it extends quite long for those really hard to reach places
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Great
customer_reviews.text: These back scratchers work as intended. My only problem with them is that the head itself is small and the fingers don't extend very far. I'm in no rush to find another product but when I do, it will be a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: GeraldM

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know I couldn't live without one
customer_reviews.text: Ohhhh where have you been all my life? A must have now. One in my purse, one in my car, one in the living room, and one in the bedstand. Plus it makes for a lazy dog petter tool!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Keller

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Cheap construction... Got these for my grandkids because they always used one I have here... Two of the four came apart same day I gave them out ... I don’t know if the other two have lasted... But no loss given the low cost...
customer_reviews.author: Michael C

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Such a funny random purchase, but the fam loves them! Got jealous that I had one and they all decided they wanted one too. So I told them to get one out of the box. Lol. Definitely can’t just get 1!
customer_reviews.author: AAC

customer_reviews.title: Not a good back scratcher..
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but not now sturdy. They also are too straight they need a slight curve in order to scratch the part of the back that itches...then it turns . I regret purchasing them.
customer_reviews.author: The Counselor

customer_reviews.title: I like mine very much
customer_reviews.text: Gave them out as stocking stuffers. The kids started hitting each other with them. So, down to two. My wife lost hers. Down to one. I have mine hidden with my weed. No one will find it and take it from me!. Love it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Eric Provan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the job
customer_reviews.text: i love these back scratchers. They are not sharp. They are shaped perfectly for their use. They telescope out really long and are easy to hold on to. I would recommend these to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Scratch that itch
customer_reviews.text: If you have a scratch you can’t itch this is the product for you..... use alone or with a friend!
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Have a back scratcher every place you need one.
customer_reviews.text: Metal tip allows for easy sterilization so that you don't transfer any within your household. Also, each member may have their own personal scratcher. Color coded.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G of Troy

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with these
customer_reviews.text: they are a must for stiff old men like me. I have several. They are sturdy and do what they are suppose to do....reach the itches that I can't. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: C. Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on the night stand
customer_reviews.text: I got tired to asking my other half to scratch my back only to not get the right spot or the right scratchiness 🤣. Finally can reach the right spot and strength. I love that it can be lengthened or shortened.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted2Amazon

customer_reviews.title: They're "OK"
customer_reviews.text: Good price, ok quality. However, i don't find them as comfortable as my old wooden one that simply feels better on my back and has a slightly wider contact surface area. I also think that probably my wooden one was/is a little sturdier in design and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey  Wilds

customer_reviews.title: useful
customer_reviews.text: i gave these out as stocking stuffers and they were a hit. they come in assorted colors price was right and they seem sturdy enough. everyone needs one of these.
customer_reviews.author: pompoodlejr

customer_reviews.title: Great Find
customer_reviews.text: These were a great find. They telescope significantly to reach any spot. They are made of strong metal that won't bend or break with regular use. I used them as stocking stuffers. Everyone loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Cylc

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Yes! And Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I hoped for. My first time owning a back scratcher. Sturdy, gentle yet strong enough to get the job done. Just received today and used right away. Used outside clothes works just as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anngel

customer_reviews.title: Simple and  functional
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool. I like them. They do telescope but they do not bend. So you need a little range of motion to scratch your back.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Meyerhoff

customer_reviews.title: These back scratchers are built well with nice and solid construction
customer_reviews.text: These back scratchers are built well with nice and solid construction, they make real nice gifts! I keep one at my desk dangling off of a large folding paper clip with one clip handle sticking up. The hole in the palm is just right to hang the scratcher on!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce K

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it was a really good deal. Prices are reasonable. The product is sturdy, and easy to use. The colored sticks were vibrant and looked nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice baxk scratcher awesome that you get 4! We keep them in different areas of the house. Our if one breaks we have more. Good quality so far so good would recomend!
customer_reviews.author: Brian young

customer_reviews.title: Not that sturdy, so-so
customer_reviews.text: These are not that sturdy. I realize I would prefer more of the hardwood type. These scope out, so you need to pull them out to extend them. My husband feels they are so-so, but we both would prefer a sturdier type of back scratcher.
customer_reviews.author: MallieCakes

customer_reviews.title: nice design
customer_reviews.text: happy with the design. only gave it four stars because the claw for scratching is a little dull....could have been sharper. would recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Stocking stuffers
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for myself, and plan to give the others as Christmas gifts. Extend long enough to reach all places that need scratching!
customer_reviews.author: BluEyeQt73

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: These work great... at least, until they loosen up with use, but that shouldn't happen for quite a while. i've purchased these twice, now, because they're a great value, and i lost a couple, and the other two eventually broke.
customer_reviews.author: S. Li

customer_reviews.title: They are EXCELLENT!!
customer_reviews.text: They are EXCELLENT!!! I keep one in every room as I am disabled and diabetic which if you're diabetic you know leaves you very itchy at times. This gives me the ability to reach every itch anywhere anytime without help. I LOVE THEM!!! And the colors are great too! Gave a couple away as Christmas gifts. 😄
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and practical
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this item is it's design and usefulness! I kind of purchased the product as a last minute stocking stuffer and just to have something to give to some casual acquaintances at Christmas. They were a hit and we kept one for ourselves. The color is cute, the scratcher paw is sturdy -- even our dogs like being groomed with these fun backscratchers!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as stocking stuffers and they are perfect. I was at Kohl's and saw ONE of these for sale for $10...I knew Amazon would come in cheaper and boy was I right!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Cota

customer_reviews.title: Goor quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. Received about a month ago and no problems. The grips don’t slip off, the extendable pole is sturdy and they work perfect. Have one in car, bedside and at office.
customer_reviews.author: Amy MacIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, folds up to make compact like the old radio antennas.
customer_reviews.text: These are AWSOME. I keep it in my desk at work. Because there are 4 in the box I shared with my colleagues. Would make great workplace Christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.author: TJR

customer_reviews.title: Got it for stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for part of a stocking stuffer. it was cute and great. they love this claw. and they come in different colors. worth the price and for stockings and other small gift ideas.
customer_reviews.author: Hana Cho

customer_reviews.title: Work well, not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying we really like these. The problem we have had, though, is they aren't very durable. The heads came off of some, and the silver tarnishes to a coppery color underneath. We had to order a second time to replace the ones that broke apart.
customer_reviews.author: Silla

customer_reviews.title: 4 pack back scratchers
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Exactly what I was looking for. They are stiff when trying to extend, which is great because they don't collapse when scratching. Much better than using a door frame or trying to get the cat to claw your back.
customer_reviews.author: A Hutch

customer_reviews.title: Two Broken
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that this package came with four back scratchers. I have two kids who always move things around, but with this many I always had one close by. The back scratches are easy to use, my only complaint is that I've had the set for about a month and two are already broken, so they aren't very durable. But i'm not too upset because I still have two that get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gudmunson

customer_reviews.title: You need to get the right angle
customer_reviews.text: Previous back scratchers have an angled bend at the "Stracher head" this one doesn't. Tts straight. So when trying to do an over the shoulder scratch you lose some contact. This forces you to change position and its a mild inconvenience. and for such an item to that solves a different mild inconvenience to have its own seems uninspiring.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Fun for kids!!! Cute design! They actually do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the set of 4
customer_reviews.text: Had surgery recently and was unable to reach a few areas on my own. This product was perfect. Also loved it was a set of 4 so I could leave one in different areas of the house and one in the car
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Bonilla Savarese

customer_reviews.title: This will do the trick
customer_reviews.text: I used a few as stocking stuffers, one at home and one at the office! Perfect to fit in a purse as well. There is Nothing like having an itch that you can’t reach, this will do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Lori L.

customer_reviews.title: Great little back scratcher bargain
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy. Work great for back scratching and since they retract, I can carry in My bag. Love that I got a pack of four since I’m always misplacing things lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kat H

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, or for office or home
customer_reviews.text: Love them have them in all important locations. Giving them as presents now.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Scratched my itch
customer_reviews.text: I have used these now for over a year and they are great! I love the collapsibility of them. You don't feel like the are going to break either. They are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, but...
customer_reviews.text: Likes: I like the telescoping feature, the value for what is included for 4 scratchers. The handles of the scratchers are different colors which would be useful for a multi-person household Dislikes: the front of the head of the scratchers looks a little chintzy. I would have preferred smooth metal like the backs of the heads
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Got an itch?  Get these!
customer_reviews.text: Work great! Got enough to have one in each of the rooms in which we normally hang out. Get a little itchy this time of year (inside with heat on), these were needed and work just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy expecting to get use out of these, break within first few days.
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun idea for a stocking stuffer for my kids. They all broke within days, the claw coming right off the extendable handle. Very cheaply made. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle W

customer_reviews.title: Liking it
customer_reviews.text: Just received. I like the product. It’s easy to use, feels good grip-wise and is not slippery. It does seem light-weight though so time will tell if it stands up in the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as stocking stuffers and they were a hit with everyone. You can always use a backscratcher!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wish the claws were tilted forward a bit more. But you can fix this by bending it. Loved the fun colors.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: ... pulling handle to hard BUT they are still the greatest back scratcher Iv'e
customer_reviews.text: son broke my pink one today by pulling handle to hard BUT they are still the greatest back scratcher Iv'e found
customer_reviews.author: Loves 2 Shop

customer_reviews.title: Nothing not to like.
customer_reviews.text: Very effective. Very reasonably priced. No complaints here! Telescoping works very well. Not fragile. Fits easily in the side pouch of my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: TheFatman

customer_reviews.title: Great back scratcher.
customer_reviews.text: I have been in search of the perfect back scratcher after my old one broke and I love these. We have them scattered throughout our house so we can always find one. They are sturdy so I think they'll last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: LDwyer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They are strong enough to scratch your back, the extension is nice & you can't beat the price for 4 of them.
customer_reviews.author: NAB

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Cute colors! No more standing against the corner of the wall trying to get that itch on your back!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: A necessity for all
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought them before and I’ll buy them again. I’ve given many away. Everyone could use this!
customer_reviews.author: Kacee4444

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These little scratcher have been wonderful. Done trying to scratch my back on a door frame!
customer_reviews.author: Bluewater

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Glad these were relatively inexpensive. Because they all broke almost immediately. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Shops A Lot

customer_reviews.title: 2/4 broke after a few uses!
customer_reviews.text: One of the arms broke and was unable to put the arm back together and now is unable to collapse. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Wong

customer_reviews.title: novelty item made cheaply
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as stocking stuffers. They're okay but made cheaply so likely won't last.
customer_reviews.author: YGinNYC

customer_reviews.title: Best scratch I ever had!!
customer_reviews.text: Aaah !! The best scratch I ever had!!! Very well made!!!!! And they are affordable quality!!
customer_reviews.author: kuri

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffers, quality item
customer_reviews.text: Santa brought one for the whole family, and it's good he did or we'd be fighting over them. seem sturdy, look good, and telescopes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, great for hospital stay/pregnancy! A perfect stocking stuffer!
customer_reviews.author: upperleft

product_meta.title: (4-Pack) Telescoping Back Scratchers, LEMENG Portable Extendable Telescopic Bear Claws Metal Back Scratchers - Hand Massager Backslap with Rubber Handles
feature_bullets: MANUAL BACK MASSAGER - It extends from 8" to 22" and easily fits into a pocket or purse.The claw size (L, H, W): 1.64"X1.75"x0.5".The Bear Claw back scratcher is safe.It has a comfortable handle and an extended handle that can easily scratch your back or any area that needs to be scratched. This portable back scraper is made of stainless steel and has a smooth finish.
HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL - The Bear Claw back scratcher is safer than the real thing.Made of stainless steel, it does not rust, does not bend, does not break, and does not deteriorate with time.

COMFORT CUSHION GRIP - Metal claw,rubber grip.This is the best choice for scratching and as body massage tool, it can help you eliminate the pressure, anxiety, and boredom. It is a useful yet super fun gadget.
4 COLORS - The set of 4 extended back scratcher, confusion of one person using the others back scratcher. Portable Massage Tools, perfect for storage or travel.
COLLAPSIBLE - The bear claws scratching makes it easier and more convenient for you to scratch your body whether it is the arm or the back.
